description:
The 2022 Season World Championship (Worlds 2022) is the conclusion of the 2022 League of Legends esports season. The tournament is being held in North America this year. The finals scheduled to take place on November 5, 2022. 24 teams have been competing over a $2,225,000 initial prize pool. The prize for first place is 22% of the final prize pool, $489,500, and the Summoner's Cup trophy. The two remaining teams are DRX and T1, who will play a best of 5 series for first place.

If DRX wins first place in the 2022 League of Legends World Championship, this market will resolve to "DRX". If T1 wins first place in the 2022 League of Legends World Championship, this market will resolve to "T1".

If a winner of the 2022 League of Legends World Championship is not determined by November 26, 2022 ET, this market will resolve 50-50.

The primary resolution source for this market is official information provided directly from Riot Games (e.g. lolesports.com) and official footage of the tournament, however other credible reporting may be used.
